title: Warren Beatty Is Accused of Sexually Assaulting a Minor in 1973
description: In a lawsuit filed this week, the plaintiff says Mr. Beatty groomed and coerced her into sex when she was 14 and 15. The actor, who had starred in “Bonnie and Clyde,” was about 35 at the time.
dc:creator: Reggie Ugwu
media:credit: Mark Von Holden/Invision, via Associated Press
media:description: The plaintiff says Warren Beatty caused her “severe emotional, physical and psychological distress.”
